description: This file defines a 'NoteEditor' component for a note-taking application, handling the display and editing of a note's title and content within a UI framework. It manages states, computed properties, and user interactions like text input and navigation between title and content fields.

classes.name: NoteEditor
classes.description: A LightningJS component that provides UI for editing or creating notes, including handling empty states and user input for title and content.

methods.name: displayEmptyText()
methods.description: Returns the placeholder text to display when no note is selected or present.

methods.name: $applyTitleChange
methods.description: Invokes the callback to update the note's title.

methods.name: $applyContentChange
methods.description: Invokes the callback to update the note's content.

methods.name: _ensureBuffers
methods.description: Initializes internal buffers for title and content based on the current note.
